mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_ROLE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATUS != '탈퇴'
SELECT MEM_ID , TO_CHAR(MEM_JOIN_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MEM_JOIN_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE ${column} = #{value} AND MEM_STATUS != '탈퇴'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = '활동' , MEM_LOGIN_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
